name: Glove Champs: Beat the Rhythm
description:
Made in approx 20 hours over the course of five days for Out of Mana Jam #1!

Title Song composed by Dan Knoflicek https://opengameart.org/users/macro

Gameplay song courtesy of this guy https://www.youtube.com/user/gamesplusjames/featured?flow=grid

Hit a note accurately to increase the BPM!

Miss a note and it will decrease!

Controls: DDR/Stepmania arrow keys

Press Spacebar for a cool uppercut!

Art development budget did not allow for actual gloves, nor an opponent!

Defeat the invisible jukebox!

Beat it into playing faster!
